_label: A Brahmin gives Krishna the Message or Invitation for the Competition to Rukmini’s Svayamvara, from a Bhagavata Purana

identified_by.content: A Brahmin gives Krishna the Message or Invitation for the Competition to Rukmini’s Svayamvara, from a Bhagavata Purana

referred_to_by.content:
(Sotheby’s NY, May 21, 1981, lot 130) (May 21, 1981); (Sotheby’s New York, NY, September 21, 1995, lot 281, sold to Ralph and Catherine Glynn Benkaim) (September 21, 1995); Ralph Benkaim [1914-2001] and
Catherine Glynn Benkaim [b. 1946], Beverly Hills, CA, by descent to Catherine Benkaim (1995-2001); Catherine Glynn Benkaim and Barbara Timmer, Beverly Hills, CA, partial sale and gift to the Cleveland Museum of Art (2001-2018); The Cleveland Museum of Art, Cleveland, OH (2018-)
